Name: Angorodon's Gaze
Description: Spell. Steals 10...42...50 Health. You gain 3...10...12 Energy if you have a condition.

Name: Animate Bone Fiend
Description: Spell. Creates a level 1...14...17 bone fiend that can attack at range. Exploits a fresh corpse.

Name: Animate Bone Horror
Description: Spell. Creates a level 1...14...17 bone horror. Exploits a fresh corpse.

Name: Animate Bone Minions
Description: Spell. Creates two level 0...10...12 bone minions. Exploits a fresh corpse.

Name: Animate Flesh Golem
Description: Elite Spell. Creates a level 3...21...25 flesh golem which leaves a fresh corpse when it dies. Exploits a fresh corpse. You can have only one flesh golem at a time.

Name: Animate Shambling Horror
Description: Spell. Creates a level 1...14...17 shambling horror. When shambling horror dies
Sacrifice: it is replaced by a level 0...12...15 jagged horror that causes Bleeding with each of its attacks. Exploits a fresh corpse.

Name: Animate Vampiric Horror
Description: Spell. Creates a level 1...14...17 vampiric horror. You gain Health equal to damage it deals. Exploits a fresh corpse.

Name: Atrophy
Description: Hex Spell. (3...6...7 seconds.) Reduces this foe's primary attribute to 0.

Name: Aura of the Lich
Description: Elite Enchantment Spell. Exploit all corpses in earshot. Animates a level 1...14...17 bone horror
Sacrifice: plus one for each exploited corpse. You have +1 Death Magic (5...37...45 seconds).

Name: Awaken the Blood
Description: Enchantment Spell. (20...39...44 seconds.) You have +2 Blood Magic and Curses. Sacrifice 50% more Health than normal.

Name: Barbed Signet
Description: Signet. Target and adjacent foes suffer from Bleeding (3...13...15 seconds).

Name: Barbs
Description: Hex Spell. (30 seconds.) Target foe takes 1...12...15 damage whenever it takes physical damage.

Name: Bitter Chill
Description: Spell. Deals 15...51...60 cold damage. Recharges instantly if target foe had more Health than you.

Name: Blood Bond
Description: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes adjacent to your target (3...10...12 seconds). Allies hitting these foes gain 5...17...20 health. If any of these foes dies while hexed

Name: Blood Drinker
Description: Spell. Steals 20...56...65 Health. You begin Bleeding (10 seconds) if your Health is above 50%.

Name: Blood Renewal
Description: Enchantment Spell. (7 seconds.) You have +3...5...6 Health regeneration. End effect: heals you for 40...160...190.

Name: Blood Ritual
Description: Enchantment Spell. (8...13...14 seconds.) +3 Energy regeneration. Cannot self-target.

Name: Blood is Power
Description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (10 seconds.) +3...5...6 Energy regeneration. Cannot self-target.

Name: Blood of the Aggressor
Description: Spell. Steal 5...37...45 Health. Inflicts Weakness (3...10...12 seconds) if target foe was attacking.

Name: Blood of the Master
Description: Spell. Heals your undead servants for 30...99...116. Healing cost: +2% Health sacrifice per servant healed.

Name: Cacophony
Description: Hex Spell. (10 seconds.) Deals 35...91...105 damage whenever target foe uses a shout or chant.

Name: Chilblains
Description: Spell. Deals 10...37...44 cold damage to foes in the area around your target; removes 1...2...2 enchantment[s] from these foes. You are Poisoned (10 seconds).

Name: Consume Corpse
Description: Spell. Teleport to a corpse's location. You gain 25...85...100 Health and 5...17...20 Energy. Exploits a fresh corpse.

Name: Contagion
Description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (60 seconds.) Whenever you gain a condition
Sacrifice: all foes in the area gain that same condition. You sacrifice 10...6...5% maximum Health each time this happens.

Name: Corrupt Enchantment
Description: Elite Hex Spell. Removes one enchantment from target foe. Removal effect: -1...7...8 Health degeneration (10 seconds).

Name: Cultist's Fervor
Description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (5 seconds plus 3 seconds more for every rank of Soul Reaping.) Your Necromancer spells cost 1...5...6 less Energy. You suffer from Bleeding (10 seconds) each time you cast a Necromancer spell.

Name: Dark Aura
Description: Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Deals 5...41...50 damage to adjacent foes whenever target ally sacrifices Health. Damage cost: you lose 5...17...20 Health.

Name: Dark Bond
Description: Enchantment Spell. (30...54...60 seconds.) Transfers 75% of incoming damage from you to your nearest servant.

Name: Dark Fury
Description: Enchantment Spell. Enchants party members (5 seconds). These party members gain one strike of adrenaline each time they hit with an attack. 50% failure chance unless Blood Magic 5 or more.

Name: Dark Pact
Description: Spell. Deals 10...40...48 damage.

Name: Death Nova
Description: Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Deals 26...85...100 damage and inflicts Poisoned condition (15 seconds) on adjacent foes if target ally dies.

Name: Deathly Chill
Description: Spell. Deals 5...41...50 cold damage. Deals 5...41...50 more damage if target foe was above 50% Health.

Name: Deathly Swarm
Description: Spell. Deathly Swarm flies out slowly and deals 30...78...90 cold damage. Hits two additional foes in the area.

Name: Defile Defenses
Description: Hex Spell. (5...17...20 seconds.) Deals 30...102...120 damage to next time target foe blocks.

Name: Defile Enchantments
Description: Spell. Deals 6...49...60 damage to target and nearby foes. Deals 4...17...20 more damage for each enchantment on them.

Name: Defile Flesh
Description: Hex Spell. (5...29...35 seconds.) Reduces healing target foe receives by 33%. Only skills with the word "heal" in the description are affected.

Name: Demonic Flesh
Description: Enchantment Spell. (30...54...60 seconds.) When using a skill on a foe
Sacrifice: deal 5...17...20 shadow damage to all other foes adjacent to you.

Name: Depravity
Description: Elite Hex Spell. (5...17...20 seconds.) Causes 1...4...5 Energy loss whenever target foe casts a spell. One foe near your target also loses Energy.

Name: Desecrate Enchantments
Description: Spell. Deals 6...49...60 damage to target and nearby foes. Deals 4...17...20 more damage for each enchantment on them.

Name: Discord
Description: Elite Spell. Deals 30...94...110 damage. No effect unless target foe has a condition and is either hexed or enchanted.

Name: Discord (PvP)
Description: Elite Spell. Deals 30...94...110 damage. No effect unless target foe has a condition and is either hexed or enchanted.

Name: Enfeeble
Description: Spell. Inflicts Weakness condition (10...26...30 seconds).

Name: Enfeeble (PvP)
Description: Spell. Inflicts Weakness condition (10...26...30 seconds).

Name: Enfeebling Blood
Description: Spell. Inflicts Weakness condition (5...17...20 seconds) on this foe and nearby foes.

Name: Enfeebling Blood (PvP)
Description: Spell. Inflicts Weakness condition (1...13...16 seconds) on this foe and nearby foes.

Name: Enfeebling Touch
Description: Touch Skill. Causes 5...41...50 Health loss. Inflicts Weakness condition (5...17...20 seconds).

Name: Envenom Enchantments
Description: Spell. Removes one enchantment from target foe. Inflicts Poisoned condition (3...9...10 seconds) for each remaining enchantment on that foe.

Name: Faintheartedness
Description: Hex Spell. (3...13...16 seconds.) Target foe attacks 50% slower and has -0...2...3 Health degeneration.

Name: Feast for the Dead
Description: Spell. Destroys one of your undead servants. Heals your servants for 10...82...100.

Name: Feast of Corruption
Description: Elite Spell. Deals 16...67...80 damage to target and adjacent foes. Steal 8...34...40 Health from each hexed foe.

Name: Fetid Ground
Description: Spell. Deals 15...55...65 cold damage. Inflicts Poisoned condition (5...17...20 seconds) if target foe is knocked-down.

Name: Foul Feast
Description: Spell. Transfers all conditions from target ally to yourself. You gain 0...36...45 Health and 0...2...2 Energy for each condition transferred. Half recharge if you remove Disease. Cannot self-target.

Name: Gaze of Contempt
Description: Spell. Removes target foe's enchantments. No effect unless this foe has more than 50% Health.

Name: Grenth's Balance
Description: Elite Spell. You gain Health equal to half of difference between you and target
Sacrifice: and this foe loses an equal amount. If this foe has less Health than you
Energy: you lose Health equal to half of difference.

Name: Hexer's Vigor
Description: Enchantment Spell. (10 seconds.) You have +1...7...8 Health regeneration. Ends if you use a non-hex skill.

Name: Icy Veins
Description: Elite Hex Spell. (10...30...35 seconds.) Deals 20...92...110 cold damage to nearby foes if target foe dies. Initial effect: deals 10...74...90 cold damage.

Name: Infuse Condition
Description: Enchantment Spell. (15...51...60 seconds.) Whenever you receive a condition
Sacrifice: it transfers from you to your closest undead servant.

Name: Insidious Parasite
Description: Hex Spell. (5...13...15 seconds.) Steal 15...39...45 Health whenever target foe hits with an attack.

Name: Jagged Bones
Description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) When target undead servant dies
Sacrifice: it is replaced by a level 0...12...15 jagged horror that inflicts Bleeding with attacks.

Name: Jaundiced Gaze
Description: Enchantment Spell. Removes an enchantment from target foe. Removal effect: your next enchantment casts 0...1...1 second[s] faster and costs 1...8...10 less Energy. (1...12...15 second[s])

Name: Life Siphon
Description: Hex Spell. (12...22...24 seconds.) Target foe has -1...3...3 Health degeneration. You have +1...3...3 Health regeneration.

Name: Life Transfer
Description: Elite Hex Spell. Also hexes foes adjacent to target (6...11...12 second). Causes -3...7...8 Health degeneration. You have +3...7...8 Health regeneration.

Name: Lifebane Strike
Description: Spell. Deals 12...41...48 damage. Steals 12...41...48 Health if target foe's Health is above 50%.

Name: Lingering Curse
Description: Elite Hex Spell. (6...25...30 seconds.) Target and nearby foes have -0...2...3 Health degeneration and receive 20% less benefit from healing.

Name: Malaise
Description: Hex Spell. (5...29...35 seconds.) Causes -1 Energy degeneration. Deals 5...41...50 damage if target foe's Energy drops to 0. You have -1 Health degeneration. Ends if this foe's Energy drops to 0.

Name: Mark of Fury
Description: Hex Spell. (5 seconds.) Allies hitting target foe gain 0...2...2 strike[s] of adrenaline. End effect: inflicts Cracked Armor (1...12...15 second[s]).

Name: Mark of Pain
Description: Hex Spell. (30 seconds.) Deals 10...34...40 damage to adjacent foes whenever target foe takes physical damage.

Name: Mark of Subversion
Description: Hex Spell. (6 seconds.) Target foe's next spell fails and you steal 10...76...92 Health. No effect unless this foe's spell targeted one of its allies.

Name: Masochism
Description: Enchantment Spell. (10...34...40 seconds.) You have +2 Death Magic and Soul Reaping. Sacrifice 5...3...3% Health when you cast a spell.

Name: Masochism (PvP)
Description: Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) You gain 1...3...3 Energy whenever you sacrifice Health.

Name: Meekness
Description: Hex Spell. (3...13...16 seconds.) Target foe attacks 50% slower and has -0...2...3 Health degeneration.

Name: Necrosis
Description: Spell. Deals 60...90 damage if target foe has a condition.

Name: Necrotic Traversal
Description: Spell. Teleport to a corpse's location. Inflicts Poisoned condition (5...17...20 seconds). Affects all nearby foes. Exploits a fresh corpse.

Name: Offering of Blood
Description: Elite Spell. You gain 8...18...20 Energy.

Name: Oppressive Gaze
Description: Spell. Deals 10...26...30 damage to target and adjacent foes. Inflicts Poison and Weakness (3...10...12 second) on foes suffering from a condition.

Name: Order of Apostasy
Description: Elite Enchantment Spell. Enchants all party members (5 seconds). These party members remove one enchantment when they deal physical damage. Removal cost: for each Monk enchantment

Name: Order of Pain
Description: Enchantment Spell. Enchants all party members (5 seconds). 3...13...16 more damage whenever these party members hit with physical damage.

Name: Order of Undeath
Description: Elite Spell. (5 seconds.) Your undead servants deal +3...13...16 damage. You lose 2% of your maximum Health whenever your servants hit.

Name: Order of the Vampire
Description: Elite Enchantment Spell. Enchants all party members (5 seconds). These party members steal 3...13...16 Health with each physical damage attack. Party members under another Necromancer enchantment are not affected.

Name: Pain of Disenchantment
Description: Elite Hex Spell. Target foe loses 1...3...3 enchantment[s]. Removal effect: that foe and all adjacent foes lose 10...82...100 Health.

Name: Parasitic Bond
Description: Hex Spell. (20 seconds.) Causes -1 Health degeneration. End effect: you are healed for 30...102...120 Health.

Name: Plague Sending
Description: Spell. Transfer 1...3...3 condition[s] and their remaining duration[s] from yourself to target foe and all adjacent foes.

Name: Plague Signet
Description: Elite Signet. Transfers all conditions with 100...180...200% of their remaining durations from yourself to target foe and all adjacent foes. 50% failure chance unless Curses 5 or more.

Name: Plague Touch
Description: Touch Skill. Transfers 1...3...3 condition[s] from yourself to target foe.

Name: Poisoned Heart
Description: Hex Spell. Inflicts Poisoned condition (5...13...15 seconds) to adjacent foes. You are also Poisoned.

Name: Price of Failure
Description: Hex Spell. (30 seconds.) 25% chance to miss. Target foe takes 1...37...46 damage whenever it fails to hit.

Name: Putrid Bile
Description: Hex Spell. (5...17...20 seconds.) Causes -1...3...3 Health degeneration. Deals 25...73...85 damage to all nearby foes if target foe dies.

Name: Putrid Explosion
Description: Spell. Explodes a corpse
Sacrifice: dealing 24...101...120 damage to foes near it. Exploits a fresh corpse.

Name: Putrid Flesh
Description: Spell. Destroys one of your undead servants. Inflicts Diseased condition (5...13...15 seconds) to foes near this servant.

Name: Ravenous Gaze
Description: Elite Spell. Deals 15...27...30 damage and steals 15...27...30 Health from target and nearby foes.

Name: Reaper's Mark
Description: Elite Hex Spell. (30 seconds.) Causes -1...4...5 Health degeneration. You gain 5...13...15 Energy if target foe dies while suffering from this hex.

Name: Reckless Haste
Description: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes adjacent to your target (6...11...12 seconds). These foes have 50% chance to miss

Name: Rend Enchantments
Description: Spell. Removes 5...8...9 enchantments from target foe. Removal cost: you lose 55...31...25 Health for each Monk enchantment removed.

Name: Rigor Mortis
Description: Hex Spell. (8...18...20 seconds.) Target foe cannot block.

Name: Rip Enchantment
Description: Spell. Removes 1 enchantment. Removal effect: inflicts Bleeding (5...21...25 seconds).

Name: Rotting Flesh
Description: Hex Spell. Inflicts Diseased condition (10...22...25 seconds).

Name: Shadow Strike
Description: Spell. Deals 12...41...48 damage. Steal up to 12...41...48 Health if this foe was above 50% Health.

Name: Shadow of Fear
Description: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes adjacent to target (5...25...30 seconds). They attack 50% slower.

Name: Shivers of Dread
Description: Hex Spell. (10...34...40 seconds.) Cold damage interrupts target foe's skills. Interruption cost: you lose 10...6...5 Energy or Shivers of Dread ends.

Name: Signet of Agony
Description: Signet. Deals 10...58...70 damage to foes near you. You begin Bleeding (25 seconds).

Name: Signet of Agony (PvP)
Description: Signet. Deals 10...58...70 damage to foes near you. You begin Bleeding (25 seconds).

Name: Signet of Corruption
Description: Signet. Deals 20...30 damage to target and nearby foes. You gain 2 Energy (maximum 12...20) for each of these foes with a condition or hex.

Name: Signet of Lost Souls
Description: Signet. You gain 10...82...100 Health and 1...8...10 Energy if target foe is below 50% Health.

Name: Signet of Sorrow
Description: Signet. Deals 15...63...75 damage. Recharges instantly if target foe is near a corpse or has a dead pet.

Name: Signet of Suffering
Description: Elite Signet. You Bleed for 6 seconds. Applies Bleeding (2...13...16 seconds) to the target of your next Necromancer skill.

Name: Soul Barbs
Description: Hex Spell. (30 seconds.) Deals 15...27...30 damage when an enchantment or hex is cast on target foe.

Name: Soul Bind
Description: Elite Hex Spell. (30 seconds.) Every time target foe is healed
Sacrifice: the healer takes 20...68...80 damage. Ends if target is suffering from a Smiting Prayers hex.

Name: Soul Feast
Description: Spell. You gain 50...234...280 Health. Exploits a fresh corpse.

Name: Soul Leech
Description: Elite Hex Spell. (10 seconds.) Steal 16...67...80 Health whenever target foe casts a spell.

Name: Soul Taker
Description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (3...25...30 seconds.) Attacks deal +15...19...20 damage and sacrifice 15...19...20 health. PvE Skill

Name: Spiteful Spirit
Description: Elite Hex Spell. (8...18...20 seconds.) Deals 5...29...35 damage to target and adjacent foes whenever this foe attacks or uses a skill.

Name: Spoil Victor
Description: Elite Hex Spell. (3...13...15 seconds.) Causes 25...85...100 Health loss whenever target foe attacks or casts spells on a creature with less Health.

Name: Spoil Victor (PvP)
Description: Elite Hex Spell. (3...13...15 seconds.) Causes 15...63...75 Health loss whenever target foe attacks or casts spells on a creature with less Health.

Name: Strip Enchantment
Description: Spell. Removes 0...2...2 enchantment[s] from target foe. Removal effect: you steal 5...53...65 Health.

Name: Suffering
Description: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes near target (6...25...30 seconds). These foes have -0...2...3 Health degeneration.

Name: Tainted Flesh
Description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (20...39...44 seconds.) Foes who hit target ally in melee become Diseased (3...13...15 seconds); this ally is immune to Disease.

Name: Taste of Death
Description: Spell. Steal 100...340...400 Health from allied undead servant.

Name: Taste of Pain
Description: Spell. Heals you for 30...126...150. No effect unless target foe is below 50% Health.

Name: Tainted Flesh
Description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (20...39...44 seconds.) Foes who hit target ally in melee become Diseased (3...13...15 seconds); this ally is immune to Disease.

Name: Toxic Chill
Description: Elite Hex Spell. Deals 15...63...75 cold damage. Inflicts Poisoned condition (10...22...25 seconds) if target foe is hexed or enchanted.

Name: Ulcerous Lungs
Description: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes near your target (10...22...25 seconds). Causes -4 Health degeneration to any of these foes that are Bleeding. Inflicts Bleeding (3...13...15 seconds) whenever these foes use a shout or chant.

Name: Unholy Feast
Description: Spell. Steal 10...54...65 Health from 1...3...4 foe[s] in the area around you.

Name: Unholy Feast (PvP)
Description: Spell. Steal 10...54...65 Health from 1...3...4 foe[s] in the area around you.

Name: Vampiric Bite
Description: Touch Skill. Steal 29...65...74 Health.

Name: Vampiric Gaze
Description: Spell. Steal 18...52...60 Health.

Name: Vampiric Spirit
Description: Elite Enchantment Spell. Steal 5...41...50 Health from target foe. You have +5...9...10 Health regeneration (10 seconds).

Name: Vampiric Swarm
Description: Spell. Steal 15...51...60 Health. Hits 2 additional foes in the area.

Name: Vampiric Touch
Description: Touch Skill. Steal 29...65...74 Health.

Name: Verata's Aura
Description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (120...264...300 seconds.) Become master of all hostile undead servants in the area. End effect: your undead servants become [masterless minion]. 50% failure chance unless Death Magic 5 or more.

Name: Verata's Gaze
Description: Spell. Make target undead servant masterless. If it is already masterless
Sacrifice: you become its master. 50% failure chance unless Death Magic 5 or more.

Name: Verata's Sacrifice
Description: Spell. (5...9...10 seconds.) 10 undead allied servants gain +10 Health regeneration. Instantly recharges if you have control of 3 or fewer servants. Transfers all conditions from those servants to you.

Name: Vile Miasma
Description: Hex Spell. (10...34...40 seconds.) Causes -1...4...5 Health degeneration (10 seconds). Initial effect: deals 10...54...65 cold damage. Hex is only applied if target foe has a condition.

Name: Vile Touch
Description: Touch Skill. Deals 20...56...65 damage.

Name: Vocal Minority
Description: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes near target (5...17...20 seconds). These foes cannot use shouts or chants.

Name: Wail of Doom
Description: Elite Hex Spell. (1...3...4 second[s]).) Target foe's attributes are 0.

Name: Wallow's Bite
Description: Touch Skill. Deals 20...50...58 damage.

Name: Weaken Armor
Description: Spell. Also affects adjacent foes. Inflicts Cracked Armor condition (5...17...20 seconds).

Name: Weaken Knees
Description: Elite Hex Spell. (1...13...16 second[s].) Target foe has -1...3...4 Health degeneration and takes 5...9...10 damage while moving.

Name: Well of Blood
Description: Well Spell. (8...18...20 seconds.) Allies in this well have +1...5...6 Health regeneration. Exploits a fresh corpse.

Name: Well of Darkness
Description: Well Spell. (5...41...50 seconds.) Hexed foes in this well have 50% chance to miss. Exploits a fresh corpse.

Name: Well of Power
Description: Elite Well Spell. (8...18...20 seconds.) Allies in this well have +1...5...6 Health regeneration and +2 Energy regeneration. Exploits a fresh corpse.

Name: Well of Ruin
Description: Well Spell. (5...25...30 seconds.) Inflicts Cracked Armor condition (5...17...20 seconds) to any foe in the well that takes physical damage. Exploits a fresh corpse.

Name: Well of Silence
Description: Well Spell. (10...26...30 seconds.) Foes in this well cannot use shouts and chants and have -1...3...4 Health degeneration. Exploits a fresh corpse.

Name: Well of Suffering
Description: Well Spell. (10...26...30 seconds.) Foes in this well have -1...5...6 Health degeneration. Exploits a fresh corpse.

Name: Well of Weariness
Description: Well Spell. (10...46...55 seconds.) Foes in this well have -1 Energy degeneration. Exploits a fresh corpse.

Name: Wither
Description: Elite Hex Spell. (5...29...35 seconds.) Causes -2...4...4 Health degeneration and -1 Energy degeneration. Deals 15...63...75 damage if target foe's Energy drops to 0. Ends if this foe's Energy drops to 0.

Name: Withering Aura
Description: Enchantment Spell. (5...17...20 seconds.) Target ally's melee attacks cause Weakness condition (5...17...20 seconds).
